articles.title: In Previous Decade, India Could Not Reduce Rate of Premature Births - The Wire
articles.description: Lack of proper medical care during pregnancy and poor nutritional status of women are the leading causes of preterm births, which contribute to a large number of kids dying within a month of their births.
articles.content:
